name: Please Stand By -I Got Something To Say 146
description: Please Stand By utilizes the iconic SMPTE color bars template and changes the palette to bring into question viewers perceptions surrounding "standards of color." An offshoot of my original series, I Got Something To Say, adds an additional more literal message. Please Stand By, I wanna dance with somebody.  With all the terrible things currently going on in the world, sometimes  I just need a good dance to shake the bad energy away.
